name: !teoola
author: !teoola

sections.description:
!teoola affords a “new insigh” into an address book and creates a “word of mouth” recommendation tool on your Smartphone.

From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘teoola’
  3. Install !teoola once it appears
  4. Activate !teoola from your Plugins page.
  5. Go to “after activation” below.

Manually

  1. Upload the teoola folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the !teoola plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “after activation” below.

After activation

  1. You should see the ‘!teoola’ menu in the dashboard sidebar.
  2. From there you can log in to your account.
  3. You’re done!
sections.faq:
Is !teoola available in my language?

!teoola currently supports English and French.
To help us translate !teoola in your language, contact us.
sections.changelog:

  • textarea minimum rows set to 6

1.5.6 [October 11, 2021]

  • refactoring modals and popups

1.5.5 [October 5, 2021]

  • adding getApiData

1.5.4 [September 29, 2021]

  • fixing a minor warning in admin dashboard

1.5.3 [December 23, 2020]

  • Changed the resize function of the calendar according to the width of the parent container

1.5.1 [December 22, 2020]

  • CSS fix

1.5 [December 22, 2020]

  • Revamped calendar

1.4 [November 23, 2020]

  • ‘News’ shortcodes

1.3 [September 18, 2020]

  • New settings
  • Events shortcodes
  • Modification of the display
  • Bug fix

1.2.3 [January 06, 2020]

  • Avatar fix

1.2.0 [October 29, 2019]

  • Modal popups
  • Bug fix
  • CSS fix

1.1.1 [August 29, 2019]

  • CSS fix

1.1.0 [June 26, 2019]

  • Official plugin release
